content:
Hallo, gibt es eigentlich für (österreichische) Sozialversicherungsnummer ein Identifier.system mit dem man Sozialversicherungsnummern speichern kann? Also etwas in der Richtung von

  "identifier" : [
    {
      "system" : "WAS_MACHT_HIER_SINN",
      "value" : "123412122000"
    }
   ]

oder bin ich hier komplett am Holzweg und muss das über was anderes abbilden?

P.S.: Ich hoffe das ist der richtige Stream zum posten /o\
(apologies for english, my german is good enough to read but not write)

@Grahame Grieve well, his question is as to what the Austrian URLs should be for the national 'tax payer id'. HL7 Austria would be the best source for that, this channel on Zulip isn't very active, so he may have to approach them directly.
so my german is not that passable .. apologies
We should ask the Zulip team for a 'translate' button, just like on Facebook :-)
I already have. See https://chat.zulip.org/#narrow/stream/137-feedback/topic/translations and also https://chat.zulip.org/#narrow/stream/127-integrations/topic/autotranslate.20every.20message

@Grahame Grieve Oh sorry, my apologies, I'll write in English next time!

@René Spronk Ah okay, I was hoping for an "official" Austrian repository which would contain a few useful URLs/identifiers to use. Guess I am getting ahead of myself :)
No need to say sorry for speaking German on the Austria channel. I’ll make sure I pay more attention next time

@Florian Apolloner I am Reinhard Egelkraut from HL7 Austria. Sorry for the late response but I wasn't available for the last couple of weeks due to the after effects of a surgery.
Yes, you are in the right place here, although as @René Spronk mentioned, this stream is indeed not very active, since most of the conversation of the Austrian TC happens during our calls.
And yes, we do already have a definition for the Austrian "Sozialversicherungsnummer" - as identifier.system we are using the fixed uri value "urn:oid:1.2.40.0.10.1.4.3.1".
You will find a version of our base profile for patient datasets in Austria on our github repository, I will send you the according link. Feel free to take a look at it, you'll also find definitions for other identifiers like the Austrian bPK-GH or our latest approach to profile the specialities of an Austrian Address.

@Grahame Grieve & @René Spronk - thank your very much for providing a first feedback
